channel.title: Overview on The Fresh Food Diet
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on The Fresh Food Diet

item.title: The Main Diet Rules
item.description: These are the main rules to follow for the diet. They are each covered in detail on this website. Ensure you get all the required micronutrients in your diet. Avoid foods that cause compulsive eating. Maintain a healthy microbiome. Eat only foods that are genuinely fresh, as defined in this diet. Get enough exercise. Get some exposure to the sun at least a few times during the year at a safe level but without sunblock or moisturiser.

item.title: The Fresh Food Rules
item.description: These are the rules for what counts as genuinely fresh food. Each rule is covered in more detail on this website, including many exceptions to the rules. Tinned/canned/jarred foods are forbidden. Foods that are kept fresh by the packaging, such as using a modified atmosphere, are forbidden. Foods with an ingredients list of more than 1 item are forbidden. Foods that have been frozen for more than 2 weeks are forbidden.

item.title: The Mother Of All Disclaimers
item.description: The details about this diet are provided in the hope that they may be useful or interesting to others, but they are provided ‘as-is’ without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. In no event shall the author or copyright holder be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the content on this website.
